name: crab-sunset
description: Token holder snapshot system for Crab Network

scripts.fix-cache: node bin/fix-cache crab && node bin/fix-cache darwinia
scripts.fetch:crab: npm run snow-lps && npm run evolution-land && npm run wcrab && npm run gcrab && npm run ckton && npm run wkton && npm run gkton && npm run xring && npm run xwring && npm run wcring && npm run native && npm run crab-locked && npm run staking-rewards && npm run ckton-staking-rewards && npm run crab-deposit-balance && npm run xring-xwring-lp-providers
scripts.fetch:darwinia: npm run snow-lps-darwinia && npm run xwcrab
scripts.snapshot: npm run fetch:crab && npm run fetch:darwinia
scripts.airdrop:all: npm run snapshot && npm run airdrop:calculate
